metadata.title: CVE-2023-6682 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 16.9 prior to 16.9.7, starting from 16.10 prior to 16.10.5,and starting from 16.11 prior to 16.11.2. A problem with the processinglogic for Discord Integrations Chat Messages can lead to a regularexpression DoS attack on the server.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
